# type

**Instance Property**

The type of information contained in the handle.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: INPersonHandleType { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the value of this property to determine how to interpret the contents of the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPersonHandle/value] property.

## Getting the Handle Information

- **value**: The data for the handle.
- **label**: A standard label that describes the meaning of the information.

items.description: A standard label that describes the meaning of the information.
